physical_examinations.vital_signs: Erythrocyte sedimentation rate: 107 mm/h, C-reactive protein level: 8.8 mg/dL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Markedly increased F-18 FDG uptake in the walls of the aorta and the subclavian arteries; mildly increased uptake in the soft tissues around the shoulders and hips; normal bone scan; degenerative joint disease in lumbar spine.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: History of biopsy-proven temporal arteritis 3 years prior.
